The Earthling Co. Powder Facial Cleanser, Dry to Normal

Brand: The Earthling Co.

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Tapioca Starch, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Erythritol, Sapindus Mukorossi Peel Extract, Kaolin, Camella Sinensis Leaf Extract, Betaine, Squalane, Punica Granatum Seed Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orang

antium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Extract, Avena Sativa (Oat) Bran Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Daucus Carota (Carrot) Sativa Extract, Glycerin

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
